definition: to stop menstruating (as a result of pregnancy, menopause or medical condition etc)
classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]

sentences.english: Overtraining can cause other problems besides missed periods.
sentences.chinese: 過度訓練能導致停經以外的其他問題。

sentences.english: The effect of metformin in the treatment of obese females with amenorrhea was observed.
sentences.chinese: 本研究觀察二甲雙胍對肥胖女性伴停經的治療效果。

sentences.english: An athlete who recovered from problems associated with overtraining and missed periods.
sentences.chinese: 一位從過度訓練和停經等問題中恢復的運動員。
化療導致的停經是可逆的。

sentences.english: Hypothesis in 40 years before the menopause, is premature ovarian failure.
sentences.chinese: 假設在40歲之前就停經的話，就是卵巢早衰了。

sentences.english: What she felt most deeply is a sense of great relaxation.
sentences.chinese: 傑米森說她停經時的最深感受是如釋重負。

sentences.english: If the menstruation always rule's woman presents the menopause.
sentences.chinese: 如月經一向規律的婦女出現停經。

pinyin: bo2 qi3 gong1 neng2 zhang4 ai4

definition: vaginal infection/inflammation of the vulva or vagina/colpitis

pinyin: A1 er3 ci2 hai3 mo4 bing4
